text: Mandatory Tutorial start. I will use this space to test tutorial texts.
If you don't want to watch all compulsory instruments of AT3 version,
please click Free Mode on Debugger Interface.
You will trigger different compulsory instruments if your account data contains main line progress reaching levels far ahead.
Don't worry, it is normal.
Select a target to attack
Select a target tile to move to
Select a target to attack
Select and cast a skill
Select a target to heal
Tap to show alert range
Tap to expand Tactical Skills
Tap to select a Tactical Skill
Long-press a character to drag it to the target location.
When moving, if you encounter difficult terrain,
you can <style=red>hold</style> and <style=red>drag</style> the unit you want to the target location.
Now, try selecting an explosive barrel using L1!
You are finally here, human.
You seem to have gained [Common Exp] from the battle just now.
The manifestation of energy in the Sea of Chaos. Can be used to significantly increase your Power.
Watch how I use them.
Well... Where did you get these craps...
Never mind. Find someone qualified to equip them.
Don't bother me with such a trifle.
Lucky, you got a [Medal].
Don't dawdle, Upgrade Maitha!
And then drive out these troublesome Calamities!
Well... I found a new unknown area around you...
Let's take a look when you have the time. Maybe we can find some Octopus Cans.
I mean, maybe there will be some treasures!
Oh, is this [Hero's Image]?
I didn't expect there could be such good stuff in the Rift.
Let's apply it to the corresponding character.
Great. This weapon seems to have the potential to be enhanced...
Just like this... and then like that...
I only do it once. Watch!
Do you feel the weapon strength is insufficient?
I knew you would say that.
It looks like there will be a hard fight...
Well, well, it's time to show my special skill.
Is this [Power of Tarot]? Even I, a knowledgeable cat, rarely see a real one...
Take a look at the gear! Is there a feeling of meowing!
If you meet the additional conditions, you may gain more rewards.
Keep in mind the stages will be marked with a hexagram.
The Spiral of Destinies is revealed to you. Search for your wish and make it a reality.
Discover new storylines and unlock alternative endings.
Prepare your characters of Elysium and...
Venture forth through the Spiral of Destinies and change the future with you.
I can tell you're becoming used to moving between Dimensions...
Time to discover talents, your inner strength.
Talents allow you to influence the battlefield directly.
Let's take a look at the Breaker's Path.
Use Star Particles to learn Tactical Skills.
I picked the first Tactical Skill for you! The Thunderstruck!
Okay. You need to explore more usages of talents during battle.
Don't you want to thank me?
You made it this time. Is it because you made a different choice?
I've been saving a record of your achievements there.
They've transformed into precious treasures!
More experiences, more treasures!
Before you enter the Crossing Worlds, I should remind you...
There are countless enemies you've never faced before waiting in the Dimension Fragment.
The most alluring treasures, however, are the ones with the greatest dangers.
Common Exp stands for your fighting proficiency.
Level characters up by using Common Exp.
It's as amazing as it is convenient, isn't it?
Equip characters with weapons and trinkets.
With the right loadout, you can gain the upper hand in battle.
Moreover, rare gear may grant a character extra effects.
Choose the right gear based on your character's unique traits.
Think you've already achieved the stature of a master tactician?
You've only just scratched the surface.
Consume the corresponding medals to rank a character up and unlock new skills.
Select one of two distinctive skills to create your own character build.
It's really hard to decide which one to select, right?
What? You want both?
Well, you can choose both... but it's going to cost you more.
Retrieve Memory Shards to recover lost power of your characters.
Use them to increase the Star Level of your character's,
and greatly improves the character's trait effect!
Summon more characters to bring them to their fullest strength!
Radiant Powder can be found throughout the Sea of Chaos.
Both weapons and trinkets can be improved with Radiant Powder.
Hmph. I'm no blacksmith. I'll just do it once.
This is the Level-up Training.
Well... the taste of knowledge...
Come on, Common Exp is waiting for you!
Use Radiant Ore on gear that cannot be upgraded any further.
This breaks the current level limit for greater enhancement.
"Treat your gear well, and they will give you the edge in battle.."
That's my advice to you. Remember it.
Humph, welcome to the new beacon â€” Star Trial!
In different trials, Talent Rewards obtained are different as well.
Courage, justice, or wisdom?
It's hard for me to select.
It is said that everyone who fights in the Memory Retrieval can find his past.
That is Memory Shard, the power that is invaluable to everyone.
So, who should be on the battlefield today...
Consuming same-name gear to increase the Star Level.
Star Level Up can awaken the powerful power dormant in the gear, but the price...
The consumed gear will be lost forever.
Think about your reserves before you make a decision.
Can you feel that? The souls scattered through various Dimensions gather here.
They train to gain strength so they can fight for glory...
Here, I can hear it beckon us to join the endless fight.
Do you answer the call?
Ding dong ding dong...
Radiant Forging is definitely the Dimension rich in gear materials. These noises give me a headache.
Well, there are many materials for gear enhancement.
You've come to the right place!
The Tower of Conquest is a ruin piled up by countless destroyed space-time.
The deeper you explore, the more likely you are to get the treasure that has long been lost in the Sea of Chaos.
But enemies guarding the tower also become more distorted and crazy.
Conquer this endless tower, or be conquered by its mighty power...
Don't let me down!
This space-time must have been some kind of extraordinary battlefield.
Even though it has been shattered and broken, there are still a lot of weapons and trinkets left behind.
Go and explore! Maybe there is an invincible weapon waiting for us!
This Tarot Whisper contains shards with Tarot power.
Equip Tarot Whispers to grant characters new skills.
Listen! Can you hear the faint whispers from the Tarot?
Hmm, Maitha is a little tacky when it comes to decorating.
I'm an expert when it comes to decorating.
I'd like to see what you can do, meow!
Do you hear that? In this space-time of the Tarot Residual,
countless Tarot Whispers are calling to us!
Of course, there are the calamities that are attracted to the power...
I believe that you know the next step, don't you?
